title: Family asked Linda Robson to be their children's godmother
text:
Linda Robson took to Instagram on Monday to share a picture of herself becoming godmother to two children she had never met before.

The Birds Of A Feather star, 61, revealed she had nipped to the church toilet in Dublin, Ireland after mass with her nan, when a family recognised her.

They asked her to be their children's godmother and she kindly accepted.

What a way to spend the day: Linda Robson reveals she was 'honoured' when a family recognised her coming out of a church toilet in Dublin and asked her their children's godmother

Linda looked lovely in her jeans, jumper and scarf as she posed for a lovely snap after the church service.

She captioned the image with the words: 'Also after the mass for our nan I was coming out the toilet in the church when I was asked by a family who recognised me off the tele to be godmother to their two beautiful children Noah and Freya.

'I felt honoured. Only in IRELAND ☘️❤️.'

Linda has been keeping a relatively low profile of late and was last pictured attending an event with her granddaughter back in May.

That was the first time she had been seen since police were reportedly 'called to her home twice in two weeks over her erratic behaviour' back in January.

Screening: Linda Robson was last pictured out with her granddaughter in May at a Paw Patrol event - it was the first public event since police were reportedly 'called to her home twice in two weeks over her erratic behaviour' in January

According to reports, the Loose Women star had not been sleeping well over the festive period and it 'all got a bit too much'.

Linda, who has recently lost more than two and a half stone in weight after ditching alcohol and sugar, is reportedly now on the road to recovery.

Linda is reportedly now on the road to recovery but a source previously told The Sun: 'It all got a bit too much for Linda and the family, and that’s why they called in police and experts.

'The family reached breaking point as Linda’s behaviour was becoming a bit erratic. They were worried she might hurt herself.'

At the time, MailOnline has contacted the Metropolitan Police and Linda's representative for comment.

Linda has lost more than two and a half stone in weight after ditching alcohol and sugar, after admitting to drinking a bottle of wine a night.

During a candid Loose Women discussion, the actress claimed she didn't have a problem with alcohol, but feared her nightly tipple could have led to a serious health issue.

She said: 'I used to drink a bottle of wine a night. I didn’t have a problem but now I think about it, it could have easily turned into one.

'That is a lot to be drinking. I didn’t think it was an issue as I didn’t need it when I woke up.'

It wasn't until Linda entered the Australian outback in 2012 for I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here that she was forced to give up alcohol for a time, and it subsequently led to the start of her weight loss.
description: Linda Robson took to Instagram on Monday to share a picture of herself becoming godmother to two children she had never met before.
